title: Borderlands.The.Pre.Sequel.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Borderlands.The.Pre.Sequel.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  

Release year : 2014
Genre : Action (Shooter) / RPG (Rogue / Action) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer : 2K Australia, Gearbox Software
Publisher : 2K
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng
Voice language:  Eng
Crack: RELOADED





System requirements:  

Operating system : Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor : 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
Memory : 2 GB
Video Card : NVIDIA GeForce 8500 / ATI Radeon HD 2600
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 5.6 GB


Game Features:  


With the return of the universe of Borderlands! Palite all barrels and grab
all that is bad, in a brand new adventure that literally takes you into space -
on the surface of the satellite of the planet Pandora. Events Borderlands:
The Pre-Sequel! place between Borderlands and Borderlands 2. Find out more
about the past Beau Jack, the main villain of Borderlands 2, and maybe you
will understand how he came to such a life. Experiment with low gravity,
with gusto shoot enemies from the new ice and laser weapons chase on the
lunar landscape on the new car and throw a complete mess!



Game Features:  


Learn how to begin the path of the main villain Borderlands, and become
an eyewitness to his crimes.

Fight and navigate in low gravity. Palite of the latest ice and laser
weapons. Display space bandits who's boss.

Try four new character classes. You are greeted bully Wilhelm zakonnitsa
niche gladiator Athena and specially modified for combat robot prototype
Fragus. Welcome to the team Handsome Jack!



RePack Features:  

Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
Do not cut / recoded
